name: VII NETWORK
overview: Vii Network, Inc. provides software-as-a-service solutions that enable businesses and organizations to launch and integrate Websites for interactive training, remote communication, and E-commerce. It offers VidStructor that enables businesses to launch a video-commerce Website for interactive video-driven programs and services. The company‘s VidStructor is used in sports, music and instrument, and culinary arts training; fitness and wellness; and executive coaching industries. Its VidStructor also enables businesses to launch VidTranet, which is used to deliver interactive video-driven programs. The company‘s VidTranet is used in healthcare and military device and process training; manufacturing process and franchise-to-franchisee training; and employee training and communication industries. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Columbia, Maryland.

funding_rounds.source_description: Vii Network video-based learning raises $1.4M [Startup Roundup]

offices.address1: THE CENTER FOR BUSINESS & TECHNOLOGY DEV
